name: Block_VQE_Debug
description: Performs VQE on Hamiltonian blocks so that the Hamitonian can be split into classical and quantum parts.  This program was written by Dr. John Stenger.  For help email me at jstenge2@gmail.com

parameters.name: k_max
parameters.description: The number of iterations for the VQE algorithm

parameters.name: phi
parameters.description: The starting angles for the anzats circuit.  The form must be [classical block index][circuit depth index][qubit index]

parameters.name: alpha
parameters.description: The starting values of the wieghts of each block.  The form must be [classical block index]

return_values.name: output
return_values.description: A collection of paramter values at each iteration

interim_results.name: Ef
interim_results.description: The energy at the end of the step
